example.text: Wild incompetence, radical leftist ideology, and total failure is what created the border crisis. And make no mistake about it, this crisis is costing Americans their lives.
After tough negotiations, we did just that. The NDAA repealed the military vaccine mandate and did NOT include language for red flag laws or for adding women to the draft.
It also gave our military the necessary resources to combat our adversaries, like China. This bill was a win for our soldiers, a win for our country, and a win for national security.
Wild incompetence, radical leftist ideology, and total failure is what created the border crisis. And make no mistake about it, this crisis is costing Americans their lives.
